title: 【語言中心】French TA's Office Hours 法文助教輔導時間
author: 呂岳芳
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 語言中心 - 呂岳芳 - carollu@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8905497
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【語言中心】French TA's Office Hours 法文助教輔導時間
日期： Mon, 2 Oct 2023 22:07:12 +0800

對準備法文課考試感到棘手嗎？想練習法文口說嗎？不要吝於尋求母語人士的幫助！馬上聯絡助教Maxime敲定時間進行輔導吧！

Your French exams are approaching and you are still struggling with some aspects of the language? Wanting to practice French speaking yet don't know where to start? Get help from a native speaker to achieve your goal! It's easy: contact our French assitant Maxime and book a time now!

★Office hours or by appointment: 

Monday 16:00~17:00 
Wednesday 16:00~17:00


★聯絡資訊 Contact info：
Maxime Terrenne
maxime.terrenne@outlook.com
